title: Durga puja in Calcutta
creator_credit: Mriganka Sekhar Ray and Calcutta Film Society
brief_description: The monsoon is over…in Bengal it is time for the festival of Durga Puja, goddess of war, militant aspect of Parvati, consort of Shiva. Celebrations praise Durga’s victory over the buffalo demon Mahisasura symbolising triumph of good over evil. The film is an impressionistic view of this festival.
